artist: Editor: Vikki Law; Artist: Barrilee Bannister , et al.; Publisher: Black Star Publishing, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of visceral figure, with letterpress text, printed in offset lithography on pink wove paper covers; 28 pp.
medium: Xerography, offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Tenacious #13: Art and Writings from Women in Prison
